This is an example post. Remove `draft: true` from the frontmatter to publish it, or delete this file entirely.

## Writing Posts

Each post should include frontmatter with:

- `title`: The post title
- `date`: Publication date (YYYY-MM-DD)
- `description`: A short summary for the listing
- `draft: true`: Add this while writing, remove to publish
